content.raw: [disable_viewpoint_rotations_gerkey](#!/osrf/handsim/branch/disable_viewpoint_rotations_gerkey) has the net result of my efforts this afternoon.  I was able to avoid the jump at start with a minor [rearrangement of terms](#!/osrf/handsim/commits/532d074a2806bdba2eaee89c1ffbe907fd3d2e18?at=default#Lsrc/HaptixControlPlugin.ccT1446), but that change introduces an error in the relationship between the camera and the marker that's very noticeable when rotating.  I then proceeded to fix that, and ended up back with the jump at start.
